STYLE.NAME: Bohemian Pilsner
STYLE.NOTES: Famous beer from Pilsen, Czech Republic. Brewed with very soft water and high hop rates. Crisp, complex and well rounded.
STYLE.PROFILE: Light to medium body with some sweetness. Saaz hop flavor and aroma, but no lingering bitterness. Clean flavor, low diacetyls. Hoppy and malty with no aftertaste.
STYLE.INGREDIENTS: Saaz hops, light pilsner malt, Czech pilsner yeast, soft (low sulfate) water profile. Morovian malt and decoction add to malt character.
STYLE.EXAMPLES: Budvar, Pilsner Urquell, Gambrinus Pilsner, Czech Rebel
